# Japanese Professional Movie Awards

| year        = 1991
| website     = https://nichipro-award.com/
}}
The  are an annual Japanese film award. The first awards were given to films made in 1991. This award is hosted by Hiroo ÅŒtaka.
Categories
*Best Film
*Best Director
*Best Actor
*Best Actress
Editions
*1st (1991)
*2nd (1992)
*3rd (1993)
*4th (1994)
*5th (1995)
*6th (1996)
